SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.ref_syste.description: Reference system for the area of interest
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.ref_syste.label: Projection

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.elev_marg.description: Magnitude of buffer to add to the elevation ranges of the species (usualy in meters), if no buffer then 0
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.elev_marg.label: Elevation buffer

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.forest_th.description: Percentage of tree cover of reference for the Global Forest Watch data according to the tolerance of the species
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.forest_th.label: Tree cover percentage

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.country_c.description: Three letter code (ISO_3166-1_alpha-3) for the country where the analysis will be done.
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.country_c.label: Country code

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.region.description: Name of the region according to the codification from the GADM data [https://gadm.org/metadata.html] for the variable NAME_1
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.region.label: Region

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.expert_so.description: Source of the expert range map
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.expert_so.label: Expert range source

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.t_0.description: Year where the analysis should start
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.t_0.label: Initial time

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.t_n.description: Year where the analysis should end (it should be larger than Initial time).
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.t_n.label: Final time

SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.time_step.description: Time range between each time step
SHI>scpSHI_Jetz_complete.yml@0.time_step.label: Time step
